LayoutXML:
<layout rendermode="Tabs">
 <tabs>
  <tab id="1">
   <text>
    <lang lid="en" hotkey="ShortcutKey" text="Note Details" />
   </text>
   <section>
    <text>
     <lang lid="en" text="Note Details" />
    </text>
    <rows>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="Note_RelatedTo" colspan="3" showlabel="true" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Related To" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="1" fieldid="Note_Subject" colspan="3" valign="top" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Subject" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
     <row>
      <cols>
       <col req="3" fieldid="Note_Detail" valign="top" colspan="3" fieldtype="2">
        <text>
         <lang lid="en" text="Detail" />
        </text>
       </col>
      </cols>
     </row>
    </rows>
   </section>
  </tab>
 </tabs>
</layout>
